title: MASTER C.STIONAIRE - SUNDAY SUPPLEMENT DAY-AFTER RECALL STUDY

introduction.target: MEN/WOMEN 18 YEARS OF AGE AND OLDER

questions.text: ARE YOU/MAY I PLEASE SPEAK WITH ANY MAN/WOMAN 18 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER?

responses.no: disc/record col. of standard F-217/col.3 of REYCO F-309A/P309B

questions.text: HAVE YOU YOURSELF SMOKED ANY CIGARETTES IN THE PAST 7 DAYS OR NOT?
APPROXIMATELY HOW MANY CIGARETTES DO YOU USUALLY SMOKE PER DAY?
HAVE YOU YOURSELF SMOKED ANY CIGARS IN THE PAST 7 DAYS OR NOT?

responses.no_and_not_smoke: ask for other male/female smoker 18+. If none available discontinue/record col. 8 of standard F-217/col.11 of REYCO F-309A/P-309B

questions.text: APPROXIMATELY HOW MANY CIGARS DO YOU USUALLY SMOKE PER DAY?

responses.less_than_1_cigar_and_less_than_1_cigare: ask for other male/female smoker 18+. If none available discontinue/record col. 8 of standard F-217/col.11 of REYCO F-309A/F-309B

questions.text: DID YOU YOURSELF, HAPPEN TO READ OR LOOK THROUGH ANY PART OF SUNDAY MORNING'S ISSUE OF OR NOT?

responses.no: disc/record col.9 of standard F-217/col.5 of REYCO F-309A/F-309B

questions.text: WHEN DID YOU LAST READ OR LOOK THROUGH THIS ISSUE OF?

responses.not_last_read_yesterday: disc/record col.10 of standard F-217/col.6 of REYCO F-309A/F-309B
responses.read_today: disc/record col.11 of standard F-217/col.7 of REYCO F-309A/F-309B

questions.text: HOW MANY TIMES ALTOGETHER WOULD YOU SAY YOU PICKED UP THIS ISSUE OF TO READ OR LOOK THROUGH IT?
DO YOU REMEMBER SEEING AN AD FOR ANY TOBACCO PRODUCTS IN YESTERDAY'S ISSUE OF OR NOT?
WHAT BRAND? WHAT OTHERS? ANY OTHERS?
DID YOU HAPPEN TO SEE AN AD FOR BRAND TOBACCO PRODUCTS IN YESTERDAY'S ISSUE OF OR NOT?
